briefTitle: Long Term Outcomes of Breast Intensity-Modulated Radiation Therapy
officialTitle: Long Term Outcomes of A Multicentre Controlled Clinical Trial of Breast Irradiation Using Intensity-Modulated Radiation Therapy
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Does breast IMRT reduces the occurrence of chronic breast pain after radiation therapy.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Subject randomised in the initial breast IMRT randomized trial will be eligible for this new study

Exclusion Criteria:

* Subjects who have experienced a recurrence (invasive or in situ) in the breast will be excluded.
